entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 9:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this morning. Periods of rain beginning this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
